name: makersbnb
description: ## Headline specifications - Any signed-up user can list a new space. - Users can list multiple spaces. - Users should be able to name their space, provide a short description of the space, and a price per night. - Users should be able to offer a range of dates where their space is available. - Any signed-up user can request to hire any space for one night, and this should be approved by the user that owns that space. - Nights for which a space has already been booked should not be available for users to book that space. - Until a user has confirmed a booking request, that space can still be booked for that night.
